twitter.title: João Guilherme Fonseca
twitter.description: Front End Developer from Brazil. I'm passionate about web development and I love to create beautiful and performant websites. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow

Metadata.description: João Guilherme's portfolio, a software developer from Brazil.

portfolio.description: Front End Developer from Brazil. I'm passionate about web development and I love to create beautiful and performant websites. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow
portfolio.article:
With vast experience in development, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, Expo, and Node, making use of tools and libraries such as TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui - Radix, TanStack, Zustand, and Prisma. I have a particular affinity for TypeScript, valuing its ability to reinforce code robustness and readability.

In my work, I consistently strive to produce clean and easily understandable code, reflecting my commitment to excellence. I have a strong desire to collaborate with development teams, contributing effective solutions and actively participating in discussions and idea exchanges.
